A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
*************spoilers******

The Last Jedi is Star Wars.   For die hard fans they will either hate it or love it.  For casual viewers from what I have seen personally they approved.

For years we have been obsessed with the Skywalker bloodline\, but we seem to forget the most important thing: Heroes come from nothing.

We see Kylo Ren and Rey have the power to choose the destiny that they want.


We see epic battles in beautiful scale.

We see concepts only ever visites in the originl expanded universe. ( Force projections? Suicide by hyperspace ram?)

Amidst all of the darkness the cruelty\, the death. It was fun and funny.

It did not go the way I thought. And thats okay. For too long it had familiar tropes and survived off of it.  This brings life back into star wars. Into individual characters. 

Again. If you are a hardcore fan. You will either love it or hate it.
